author: Lupin
subject: Mp3 and asf here!
body:
I've found that site http://chumkins.net/main.htm , where you can find 15
mp3 (two are many tracks from 72ME tracks in one mp3), and 2 asf
files.....including the full version of Tokyo Crisis! I've not tried to
download it (11mb, 36mb, 14mb, 19mb, 22mb) maybe you want.....
